English: Heliport, Severovodsk
Next morning
Another day, another transport mission, Nikolay?
It does get repetitive, Ippolit, but the thrill of the flight itself makes up for it. I wouldn't trade it for anything else.
True, but that does not mean we should be flying all the time. I'm fully expecting a vodka break sooner or later.
All right, cut that crap and get in that helicopter. Time to get this thing into the air!

FIREFLY TO ULYANA 1. YOU HAVE YOUR ORDERS. PICK UP THAT SQUAD AND GET THEM TO THE FRONT LINES IN MALSK. THEN RETURN TO HELIPORT AND AWAIT FURTHER INSTRUCTIONS. WE EXPECT MORE SQUADS TO ARRIVE SOON IN THE PORTS. OVER.
ULYANA 1 TO FIREFLY, WE'RE TAKING OFF. OUT.
EVERYONE IS ON BOARD, ULYANA. GET US TO THE FRONT LINES.
THANKS FOR THE RIDE, BOYS!
ALL RIGHT, TIME TO HEAD HOME. I'M FEELING WE SHOULD START THAT VODKA BREAK TODAY.

FIREFLY TO ULYANA 1, CHANGE YOUR COURSE TO CENTRAL KOLGUYEV. A SQUAD IS STRANDED IN ASTRABIRSK WITH ENEMY LIGHT TANKS APPROACHING. YOU ARE NEAREST. TAKE CARE OF THOSE TANKS AND GET THE SURVIVORS BACK HOME. OVER.
IT SEEMS VODKA BREAK WILL HAVE TO WAIT. FINALLY, SOME ACTION!
ULYANA 1 TO FIREFLY, UNDERSTOOD, ON OUR WAY. OUT.
THOSE TANKS ARE TAKEN CARE OF. LET'S TAKE OUR BOYS HOME.
ALL ABOARD, DIRECTION: HOME SWEET HOME! VODKA FOR EVERYONE! THE BEST MEDICINE FOR A WOUNDED COMRADE, AM I RIGHT?
YOU HAVE A SERIOUS PROBLEM, IPPOLIT. BUT I WOULD NOT MIND A SHOT OF VODKA AFTER THAT!
Heliport
Pick up units
Unload units

Pick up survivors

UNLOAD UNITS
RETURN TO HELIPORT
